comments:
When using MagicDraw11 instantiation of PrimitiveTypes defined in profiles (e.g. "String" from the UML profile) fails. The types are instantiated twice, leading to an AttributeStoreException:

------------------------------snip--------------------------------
540 ERROR <<Key>> [no Name@30774096]: could not set property Type = [<<PrimitiveType>> [no Name@6686632], <<PrimitiveType>> [no Name@29307400]]
org.openarchitectureware.core.frontends.xmi.AttributeStoreException: attribute Type of <<Key>> [no Name@30774096] cannot be set to [<<PrimitiveType>> [no Name@6686632], <<PrimitiveType>> [no Name@29307400]]
	at org.openarchitectureware.core.frontends.xmi.DefaultInstantiatorService.setAttribute(DefaultInstantiatorService.java:127)
	at org.openarchitectureware.core.frontends.xmi.MappingInstantiator.setProperties(MappingInstantiator.java:403)
	at org.openarchitectureware.core.frontends.xmi.MappingInstantiator.instantiateMetamodel(MappingInstantiator.java:284)
	at org.openarchitectureware.core.frontends.xmi.MappingInstantiator.loadDesign(MappingInstantiator.java:117)
	at org.openarchitectureware.core.frontends.xmi.workflow.XMIInstantiator.invoke(XMIInstantiator.java:124)
	at org.openarchitectureware.workflow.container.CompositeComponent.internalInvoke(CompositeComponent.java:74)
	at org.openarchitectureware.workflow.container.CompositeComponent.invoke(CompositeComponent.java:64)
	at org.openarchitectureware.workflow.WorkflowRunner.executeWorkflow(WorkflowRunner.java:222)
------------------------------snip--------------------------------


Problem does not exist if "String" is defined within the model.

Problem was solved by Ingo Feltes.

In MagicDraw 11 the XMI export contains more than one xmi:Extension areas. File MagicDrawModuleMerger fixed.

- MagicDrawModuleMerger 1.7

Created an attachment (id=50338)
Patched file

MagicDrawModuleMerger.class

traces.message: attribute Type of <<Key>> [no Name@30774096] cannot be set to [<<PrimitiveType>> [no Name@6686632], <<PrimitiveType>> [no Name@29307400]]
